headlines: Ship Modern React Apps in Seconds
The Ultimate CLI for Enterprise-Grade React Projects
Stop Configuring. Start Building with NEXO.
subheadlines: Scaffold React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui apps instantly.
An extensible, developer-first CLI for modern web development.
Zero config fatigue. Best practices built-in by default.
hero.description: NEXO is the extensible CLI that orchestrates your entire frontend stack. From React 19 to Tailwind and shadcn/ui, get a production-ready codebase in seconds so you can focus on shipping features.

features.title: Lightning Fast Scaffolding
features.description: Generate full application structures in under 2 seconds. No more waiting for heavy initial downloads.
features.benefit: Start coding immediately without the setup delay.

features.title: TypeScript First
features.description: Built with TypeScript best practices out of the box. Choose between Standard, SWC, or React Compiler variants.
features.benefit: Type-safety from day one, reducing runtime errors.

features.title: Tailwind + shadcn/ui
features.description: Native integration with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for beautiful, accessible components.
features.benefit: Standardized, modern UI layer ready for customization.

features.title: Smart Directory Handling
features.description: Intelligently detects existing projects and offers to continue or overwrite, preventing data loss.
features.benefit: Safely manage project creation in any folder.

features.title: Lazy Loading Architecture
features.description: Configurators load on-demand, keeping the CLI leightweight and responsive.

features.title: Dry Run Mode
features.description: Preview your project structure before writing a single file to disk.
features.benefit: Experiment safely without cluttering your filesystem.

howItWorks.description: Launch the interactive wizard directly from your terminal.
Choose your preferred tools from our curated list of modern libraries.
NEXO orchestrates the file creation, setting up routing, state, and UI seamlessly.
Jump straight into a running development server with everything configured.

templates.name: SaaS Starter
templates.description: Full-stack SaaS boilerplate with Auth, API integration, and React Query.

templates.name: Admin Dashboard
templates.description: Data-heavy dashboard with charts, tables, and sidebar navigation.
templates.screenshotAlt: Analytics dashboard with graphs and data tables

templates.name: Minimal App
templates.description: Clean slate with just the essentials configured.

commandReference.description: Create a new project with the interactive wizard or flags.
Scaffold components, hooks, or features into an existing project.
Check current project health and dependencies.

comparison.summary: Nexo combines the speed of Vite with the comprehensive setup of a full framework, without the bloat.

faq.question: Is Next.js supported?
faq.answer: Next.js support is currently in development and tagged as 'Coming Soon'. We are prioritizing App Router templates.

faq.question: Can I use JavaScript instead of TypeScript?
faq.answer: Yes! NEXO fully supports JavaScript. You can use the `--js` flag or select JavaScript in the interactive wizard.

faq.question: How do I add a custom library?
faq.answer: NEXO projects are standard React applications. You can `npm install` any library as you normally would. Our generated code is not proprietary.

faq.question: What is 'Dry Run' mode?
faq.answer: Dry Run mode allows you to simulate the project creation process to see exactly what files would be created, without actually writing anything to your disk.

faq.question: Where can I find the documentation?
faq.answer: Creating specific documentation is on our roadmap. For now, the comprehensive README and this website serve as the primary guides.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonials.quote: NEXO saved me hours on my last hackathon. The presets are spot-on.

testimonials.name: Mike Chen
testimonials.quote: Finally, a CLI that sets up shadcn/ui correctly without me having to fiddle with config files.

testimonials.name: Alex Rivera
testimonials.quote: The 'dry-run' feature is a lifesaver for checking templates before committing to them.

testimonials.name: Emily Zhang
testimonials.quote: I use the component generator daily. It enforces our team's folder structure perfectly.

testimonials.name: David Smith
testimonials.quote: Super easy to use. I was up and running with a modern stack in minutes.

metaTitles: NEXO CLI - The Ultimate React Scaffolding Tool
Scaffold Modern React Apps in Seconds | NEXO
Fast, Extensible React CLI for Modern Developers
Create React Apps with Best Practices | NEXO CLI
metaDescriptions: Automate your React development with NEXO. Scaffold app with TypeScript, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui in seconds. The developer-first CLI tool.
Stop configuring and start coding. NEXO CLI offers the fastest way to build enterprise-grade React applications with modern defaults.
NEXO is the extensible CLI for scaffolding modern frontend projects. Features lazy loading, dry-run mode, and robust presets.
Get a production-ready React codebase instantly. NEXO handles the boilerplate so you can focus on building authorized, styled, and tested features.
The missing CLI for React. Zero-config setups for Next.js (soon) and Vite. Native shadcn/ui integration. Install create-nexo today.
seo.ogTitle: NEXO - Ship Modern React Apps Faster
seo.ogDescription: The extensible CLI for modern frontend orchestration. React, Tailwind, TS, and more.
